Content: # Boundo Meta-app: Info & Manager Boundo Meta-app is all about your apps and beyond. Check info of apps on your phone, and organize them into categories. Designed for Android enthusiasts, Meta-app is available on **Android** and **Wear OS**. ### 1. Develop **1.1 Requirements** - Android Studio `Meerkat` (AGP `8.9`) - Java `17`, Kotlin `2.1.21`, Gradle `8.13` **1.2 Configure automatic signing** - **Copy** the file named `custom.properties.template` in `doconfig` directory, **rename** it to `custom.properties` and make necessary **change**s to it **1.3 Build universal APKs (App API feature included, release variant)** - Configure signing as specified in section 1.2 - Download BundleTool binary from [BundleTool Releases](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases), and save it as `doconfig/bundletool.jar` in this project - Run Gradle task from commandline `gradlew :app:genUniversalApks` - Look for `app/build/outputs/app-universal-release.apks` in this project **1.4 Build FOSS version (less feature)** - Configure signing as specified in section 1.2 - Download BundleTool binary from [BundleTool Releases](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases), and save it as `doconfig/bundletool.jar` in this project - Run Gradle task from commandline `gradlew :app:genFossApks` - Look for `app/build/outputs/app-universal-foss.apks` in this project ### 2. Download [](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cliuff/boundo/main/ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.madness.collision&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1)
Translation: # Boundo 元应用：信息与管理 Boundo 元应用专注于您的应用及更多。 查看手机上应用的信息，并将它们整理成类别。 为 Android 爱好者设计，元应用可在 **Android** 和 **Wear OS** 上使用。 ### 1. 开发 **1.1 要求** - Android Studio `Meerkat`（AGP `8.9`） - Java `17`，Kotlin `2.1.21`，Gradle `8.13` **1.2 配置自动签名** - **复制** 位于 `doconfig` 目录下名为 `custom.properties.template` 的文件， **重命名** 为 `custom.properties` 并进行必要的**修改** **1.3 构建通用 APK（包含应用 API 功能，发布版本）** - 按第 1.2 节指定配置签名 - 从 [BundleTool Releases](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases) 下载 BundleTool 二进制文件， 并保存到本项目的 `doconfig/bundletool.jar` - 从命令行运行 Gradle 任务 `gradlew :app:genUniversalApks` - 在本项目中查找 `app/build/outputs/app-universal-release.apks` **1.4 构建 FOSS 版本（功能较少）** - 按第 1.2 节指定配置签名 - 从 [BundleTool Releases](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases) 下载 BundleTool 二进制文件， 并保存到本项目的 `doconfig/bundletool.jar` - 从命令行运行 Gradle 任务 `gradlew :app:genFossApks` - 在本项目中查找 `app/build/outputs/app-universal-foss.apks` ### 2. 下载 [](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cliuff/boundo/main/ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.madness.collision&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1)

RowTranslations.translatedContent: # Boundo 元应用：信息与管理

RowTranslations.originContent: Boundo Meta-app is all about your apps and beyond.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Boundo 元应用专注于您的应用及更多。

RowTranslations.originContent: Check info of apps on your phone, and organize them into categories.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 查看手机上应用的信息，并将它们整理成类别。

RowTranslations.originContent: Designed for Android enthusiasts, Meta-app is available on **Android** and **Wear OS**.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 为 Android 爱好者设计，元应用可在 **Android** 和 **Wear OS** 上使用。
- **复制** 位于 `doconfig` 目录下名为 `custom.properties.template` 的文件，

RowTranslations.originContent: **rename** it to `custom.properties` and make necessary **change**s to it
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **重命名** 为 `custom.properties` 并进行必要的**修改**

RowTranslations.originContent: **1.3 Build universal APKs (App API feature included, release variant)**
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **1.3 构建通用 APK（包含应用 API 功能，发布版本）**

RowTranslations.originContent: - Configure signing as specified in section 1.2
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 按第 1.2 节指定配置签名
- 从 [BundleTool Releases](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases) 下载 BundleTool 二进制文件，

RowTranslations.originContent: and save it as `doconfig/bundletool.jar` in this project

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 从命令行运行 Gradle 任务 `gradlew :app:genUniversalApks`
**1.4 构建 FOSS 版本（功能较少）**

RowTranslations.originContent: - Configure signing as specified in section 1.2
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 按第 1.2 节指定配置签名
- 从 [BundleTool Releases](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases) 下载 BundleTool 二进制文件，

RowTranslations.originContent: and save it as `doconfig/bundletool.jar` in this project

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 从命令行运行 Gradle 任务 `gradlew :app:genFossApks`
